about_the_game:
Project_03 is aiming to give you the old school fps experience in the new era of gaming.Quick matches in various maps and gamemodes, also the practice range to improve your skills in a fun way.
GAMEPLAY
-The gameplay mechanics is more likely a quick battle royale style where you can run quickly and jump into action, choose different guns, healing overtime and have different characters with abilities to manipulate the enemy strategy or maybe even freeze them, you have options to pick different guns to customize your gameplay everytime you die, but you can only choose an ability class when the game starts.
MAPS AND MODES
-Maps are not big enough to loose your way back into the action and they have different styles like a completely house or a completely under water , your ability and gun picks will matter for the maps, it will also push you in action cause nowhere to sit and hide.
-Modes are currently Deathmatch style, you can pick your team or you can go in solo with classical deathmatch mode.
PRACTİCE RANGE
-The practice range is one of the most important things in the game cause we design it not for only this game but for everyone who want to have a fun experience while heatining their aim.The area is not for only improve aim but maybe to stressed out with dummies in a unique ambience

name: Project_03

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Project_03 is aiming to give you the missed old school fps experience in the new era of gaming.Quick matches in various maps and gamemodes, also the practice range to improve your skills in a fun way.
